PROJECT NAME

  • react-git-explorer

OBJECTIVE

  • This app aim

    • To use the apollo graphql client to extract github data via its GraphQL APIs
    • Infinite scroll where github project cards will be displayed.

BLOG POST

  • Read about the details of the implementation in the published blog on Medium.com
